summary: Leopold De Angeli is a talented playwright, but like many scribes he fancies the drink a little too much. In the hopes of saving Leopold's life, his theater friends come together to stage an intervention for him.
cast: Olympia Dukakis|Alexandra Eitel|Thomas Flanagan|Carlin Glynn|Lainie Kazan|Denise Lute|Mario Macaluso|David Margulies|Mary Stuart Masterson|Gary Swanson|Robert Walden|Christina Zorich
title: Whiskey School
